sentence.Network_en: " We are in trouble, " he said gloomily.
sentence.Network_cn: “ 我们遇上了麻烦, ” 他沮丧地说道.

sentence.Network_en: He tells me gloomily that he has been called up for army service.
sentence.Network_cn: 他伤感地告诉我他已经被征召入伍了。

sentence.Network_en: Brazilians look gloomily forward to a New Year that even the president admits will be grey and cheerless.
sentence.Network_cn: 展望新年，巴西人心情沮丧，甚至连总统都承认明年困难重重，不容乐观。

entry.def: If a place is gloomy, it is almost dark so that you cannot see very well.

example.ex: Inside it's gloomy after all that sunshine...
example.tran: 尽管阳光明媚，里面依然暗淡无光。

entry.def: If people are gloomy, they are unhappy and have no hope.

example.ex: Miller is gloomy about the fate of the serious playwright in America.
example.tran: 米勒对这位严肃剧作家在美国的命运颇为忧虑。

entry.def: If a situation is gloomy, it does not give you much hope of success or happiness.

example.ex: ...a gloomy picture of an economy sliding into recession...
example.tran: 经济陷入萧条的惨淡景象

example.ex: Officials say the outlook for next year is gloomy.
example.tran: 官员们表示来年前景黯淡。

sentences.sentence: "such a change is gloomily foreseen by many"

auth_sentence.content: "I wish they would," Sheila said gloomily.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: "I wish they would," Sheila said gloomily.

auth_sentence.content: So why has even a 50-year future been reported so gloomily?
auth_sentence.res_content: So why has even a 50-year future been reported so gloomily?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: So why has even a 50-year future been reported so gloomily?

auth_sentence.content: "He doesn't drink coffee," she said gloomily.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: "He doesn't drink coffee," she said gloomily.
